nodes.text: An empath test was a technique used by the Jedi Order to determine if one of its members possessed the rare ability to feel the emotions of other beings. The test was performed inside the Jedi Temple. During the High Republic Era, Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh asked Padawan Imri Cantaros if he had considered asking his Master, Douglas Sunvale, to take him to undergo the empath tests. However, Cantaros dismissed his insight as merely being the result of paying attention instead of the Force.
